DOC.brief_summary: The study compare safety efficacy prasugrel , administer different dos clopidogrel treatment Asian participant acute coronary syndrome ( ACS ) undergo percutaneous coronary intervention .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Antiplatelet Therapies Asian Subjects With Acute Coronary Syndrome
DOC.criteria: A person diagnose acute coronary syndrome ( ACS ) undergo percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) A person East Southeast Asian descent A person legal age 18 ( age 21 Singapore ) mentally competent provide sign write informed consent enter study If woman childbearing potential , must test negative pregnancy agree use reliable method birth control A person severe cardiovascular condition cardiogenic shock time randomization , ventricular arrhythmia congestive heart failure A person increase risk bleeding ( e.g . active internal bleeding , history bleed disorder , recent fibrinolytic therapy randomization study ) A person prior history one following : ischemic hemorrhagic stroke ; intracranial neoplasm , arteriovenous malformation , aneurysm ; prior history transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) A person need take antiplatelet therapy Aspirin duration study A person receive daily treatment nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) cyclooxygenase2 ( COX2 ) inhibitor discontinue A person severe liver disease , cirrhosis A person condition alcoholism , mental illness , drug dependence
